```{r}

amp_combos = gtools::permutations(n = 5, r = 5, v = 0:4) %>% 
  as_tibble(.name_repair = "unique") %>% 
  rename(A = `...1`,
         B = `...2`,
         C = `...3`,
         D = `...4`,
         E = `...5`)

# amp_combos

```



```{r}
amp_combos_out = amp_combos %>% 
  dplyr::rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(A_output = map2(A, 0, amplifier_fxn, input_df = int_code_data)) %>% 
  mutate(B_output = map2(B, A_output[1], amplifier_fxn, input_df = int_code_data)) %>% 
  mutate(C_output = map2(C, B_output[1], amplifier_fxn, input_df = int_code_data)) %>% 
  mutate(D_output = map2(D, C_output[1], amplifier_fxn, input_df = int_code_data)) %>% 
  mutate(E_output = map2(E, D_output[1], amplifier_fxn, input_df = int_code_data))




```




```{r}
amp_combos_out %>% 
  select(-A_output, -B_output, -C_output, -D_output) %>% 
  mutate(E_output2 = E_output[1]) %>% 
  select(-E_output) %>% 
  unnest() %>% 
  filter(E_output2 == max(E_output2))
```
